scenario_text.value: Takuma! Do you have a second?
Are you okay, Professor?

Yes, well... Even when I try not to think, my
brain won’t let me stop.
But never mind that. Look here.

The debris in front of the wall...
Doesn’t it seem like it’s been piled up?
And there’s a thin line in the wall!
Yes! I think this might be a door.

This debris has been moved. Maybe Piemon
wants to throw us off his trail?
By sealing the door?
Yes, that is possible.
Takuma, Agumon? Help me move this debris.
I’m on it, Professor!

I’m helping too!
Three of us will make it easy!
All right. Let’s go...
Ready...aaand...
*huff* *huff*... We moved it all, I think.

That took more effort than I expected.
My back...
But just as I thought, this wall has a door.

And from the angle of it, the door leads to
that building to the north.

(We’ve looked and looked but have not found
Piemon or Miyuki yet.)

(They must be past this door, then...
They have to be in that building.)

We should go check it out. But we need to let
everyone know what we’ve found, first.
Are you okay, Professor? Can you move?
Yes, I’m fine.

I’m sorry I worried you so badly. That wasn’t
a good look.

I’m better now, though.
I can move, no problem.
Good. Oh, have you remembered anything?

It’s starting to come back. Different
memories of my childhood.

But the memories are still a jumble.
I wouldn’t know what to tell you first.
Let me try and gather my thoughts as we move.
We could let you rest some more...

No. I don’t even know if these memories will
help us get home.

And if that’s the case, I’d prefer to use
what feeble strength I have to rescue Miyuki.

When my head clears up enough that I can
properly explain things,

if I recall anything useful for getting home,
I will tell you about it immediately.
You’ll tell me?

You are wise and trustworthy.
I would want you to hear it, yes.
All right, Professor...

There is one thing I can tell you now,
though. A theory based on my memories.

It is about the song that Miyuki here, and my
sister Miyuki Minase, both sang.
Get out of my way!
Was that Haru’s voice?
Let’s hurry, Takuma!
